title: Onkel Tom Angelripper - H.E.L.D. [Metal] (2014) (mp3)
description:
Onkel Tom Angelripper - H.E.L.D. [Metal] (2014) (mp3)

Onkel Tom Angelripper (formerly called only Tom Angelripper) is the side project formed in 1995 in Gelsenkirchen, Germany, by the leader of Sodom (Thomas Such). This group includes fiesteras, dynamic, cheerful melodies, showing the biggest party of the leader of Sodom side. So to speak is like being in a bar with a beer in hand, and singing several songs "folk" barmaids, creating a party atmosphere very accomplished, with even an air punk (Of course the album is a kind of thrash melodic) metal.

Year: 2014
Country: Germany
Genre: Thrash Metal
Codec: Mp3
Bitrate: 252Kbps
